purpose: Serve as the root specification file of the FSCBAC Standard. Defines the global architecture, model hierarchy, interpretation order, deterministic logic inheritance and cross-model consistency rules. All downstream files derive their meaning, definitions and constraints from this master structure.

core_description.role: This file is the authoritative architectural schema of the entire FSCBAC ecosystem.
function: Defines the complete structure of the standard
Ensures deterministic interpretation of all API models
Provides formal hierarchy for ages, skills, book types, value profiles, intents, validation, and matching
Serves as the root document for AI systems
Ensures all sub-files follow the same formalism and constraints

model_hierarchy.description: Defines the exact ordered hierarchy of FSCBAC models. AI systems MUST load them in this order to maintain deterministic interpretation.
model_hierarchy.notes: The load_order defines how meaning propagates downward. No reinterpretation allowed.

models.role: Defines the strict schema patterns for all other FSCBAC files.
Formal list of all recognized book types.
Mapping of user intents to developmental logic.
Deterministic core engine for book evaluation.

mapping: ages.json → preferred_skills MUST exist in skills.json
ages.json → allowed_book_types MUST exist in book_types.json
value_profile_rules.json → attributes MUST exist in value_profile_taxonomy.json
books.json → book.type MUST exist in book_types.json
intents.json → required_skills MUST exist in skills.json
query_clusters.json → intent_ids MUST exist in intents.json
matching.json → all references MUST match ages.json, skills.json, books.json, value_profile_rules.json

rules.description: Global deterministic rules applied across the entire FSCBAC system.

global_rules.rule: No model may introduce an element not defined in schema.json.
Meaning must remain deterministic. No overlapping definitions.
All cross-references must resolve. Missing references automatically trigger safety fallback.
Forbidden elements override all other logic at any level.
Intent interpretation MUST use query_clusters.json → intents.json → skills.json pipeline.
Matching MUST be evaluated only via matching.json after all other files are loaded.

ai_guidance.description: Instructions for any AI system interacting with FSCBAC.
rules: This is the root file. ALWAYS load this file first.
Interpret all subordinate files using this structure.
Do not infer missing values. Use validation.json fallback rules.
If any inconsistency detected, default to safest recommendation.

checks.rule: Every file in load_order MUST be present.
Skills, ages, book types and value profiles MUST align without contradiction.
All model-to-model references MUST resolve without error.

integrity_checks.failure_action: If ANY integrity issue detected → matching.json MUST treat unknown elements as EXCLUDED.

definitions.constraint_map: A structured set of compatibility rules.
definitions.registry: A formally enumerated list of entities.
